text: X칩chitl G치lvez Ruiz (born 22 February 1963) is a Mexican computer engineer, politician and businesswoman. She was an unsuccessful candidate for President of Mexico in the 2024 election. From 2015 to 2018, she was mayor of the Miguel Hidalgo borough of Mexico City. Since 2018, she has served as a senator in the LXIV Legislature of the Mexican Congress. ==References== Category:1963 births Category:Living people Category:Politicians from Mexico City Category:Mexican engineers Category:Mexican businesspeople Category:People from Hidalgo (state)
